metadata.description: Top policies and metadata from GRPO-embedded MCTS over decoding policies pretraining
folio_test_dataset_prompts:
The following facts are given: No payment cards issued by Russian banks can be used with ApplePay.
All MIR payment cards are issued by Russian banks.
Some international payment cards can be used with ApplePay.
Social payments in Russia can only be transferred to MIR payment cards.
Bank of America payment cards can be used with ApplePay.. Is the conclusion "Bank of America payment cards are international." logically entailed by the above facts? Think out loud step by step and, on a new line, write one of the following three options by itself as your final answer: False, Uncertain, or True
